mapper.select: SELECT SPC.PARAMETER_ID,SPC.CODE, SPC.TARGET_ID,SPC.DISPLAY, SPC.TABLE_FIELD_NAME, SPC.TITLE,SPC.DESCRIPTION, SPC.LINE_NUMBER,SPC.COLUMN_NUMBER,SPC.DISPLAY_LENGTH,SPC.LABEL_WIDTH,SPC.DATA_LENGTH, SPC.REQUIRED,SPC.READ_ONLY,SPC.ENABLED,SPC.SOURCE_TYPE,SPC.SOURCE_CODE,SPC.DEFAULT_TYPE, SPC.DEFAULT_VALUE, SPC.DEFAULT_TEXT, SPC.EXTRA_ATTRIBUTE, SPC.OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, (CASE SPC.SOURCE_TYPE WHEN 'LOV' THEN (SELECT SL.DESCRIPTION FROM SYS_LOV SL WHERE SL.CODE = SPC.SOURCE_CODE) WHEN 'CODE' THEN (SELECT SCB.DESCRIPTION FROM SYS_CODE_B SCB WHERE SCB.CODE = SPC.SOURCE_CODE) ELSE '' END) as SOURCE_NAME FROM SYS_PARAMETER_CONFIG SPC WHERE SPC.CODE = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SPC.TARGET_ID = #{targetId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} ORDER BY SPC.LINE_NUMBER ASC
SELECT SPC.* FROM SYS_PARAMETER_CONFIG SPC LEFT JOIN SYS_REPORT SR ON SR.REPORT_ID = SPC.TARGET_ID WHERE SPC.CODE='REPORT' AND SR.REPORT_CODE = #{reportCode} ORDER BY SPC.LINE_NUMBER
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM SYS_PARAMETER_CONFIG WHERE CODE = #{0} AND TARGET_ID = #{1}
DELETE FROM SYS_PARAMETER_CONFIG WHERE CODE = 'TASK' AND TARGET_ID = #{taskId}
